channel.title: [508] Several questions
channel.description:
Ok question # 1 My rune crossbow can hit a 168 on npcs very common, and barely hits at all on players. However when it does hit it can hit high. How can I make it hit more often on players, and not hit so high on npcs?
Question # 2. Restore Special Potion
I want to make a potion that when you drink it, each dose will heal your special bar fully but can only be drank once every 2 minutes if you're a player, and can be drank as often as you want if your an admin.
Question # 3. Specials almost never hit. How can I make it where specials for weapons hit more often and higher? They almost never hit and most the time barely hit at all.
Any answers?

item.title: [508] Several questions
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Brandon12111 Mod Brandon12111
item.description:
@Mod_Brandon12111 wrote:

Answers to #1 and #3, Client-Sided it’s most likely the Ints.

Read full topic
